title: When trying to control lights while phone is on pixel stand it keeps asking for phone to be unlocked
content: When trying to use google assistant for home control (turning lights on...etc) while the phone is docked on pixel stand, it keeps asking for the phone to be unlocked which makes the voice assistant feature useless, if I have to unlock it for every action. Previously (a year ago or so) this wasn't the case so I am not sure what changed
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
